page.title: 01West Allendale
page.content: The West Allen runs from North to South through this block, while the Hexham-Alston road climbs Whitfield Moor to the west, towards its highest point of 471metres. Ninebnks is the only village in the block and ismore a cluster of agricultural buildings around a ruined tower. The church itself is over 3/4 miles further south. There ae many farms either side of the Allen, particularly to the East, ad some forestry in the northwest. Catle and sheep are raised in the river valley, where hay is also grown. The fells to the west ae rough grazed by sheep
